data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,956,187 lost in Kafr ash Shaykh that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 137,613 believers in Kafr ash Shaykh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,956,187 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 137,613 believers in the state of Kafr ash Shaykh the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Beja, Bedawi people might believe through him.
Father, help your children in Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt has a population of 3,093,800.

We estimate Kafr ash Shaykh has 137,613 people who might know Jesus, 268,594 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,687,593 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kafr ash Shaykh, Egypt.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
